content: to make the edge more even and get a good start on the border the main rule for this and the following rounds is that you make ordinary stitches in ordinary stitches and front posts around front post stitches start in any ch1-corner * 2 double_crochet + ch1 + 2 double_crochet 1 fphdc 1 double_crochet x 4 times 1 fphdc skip 1 st 1 double_crochet in the next 3 sts 1 fphdc 1 half_double_crochet 1 fpsc x 3 times 1 half_double_crochet 1 fphdc skip 1 st 1 double_crochet in the next 3 sts 1 fphdc 1 double_crochet x 4 times 1 fphdc* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 18 double_crochet 1 ch1 3 fpsc 4 half_double_crochet 12 fphdc © 2023 krokoklint design made by lina kittel all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this pattern you may link to it but please do not reprint it on your site round 15 colour d start in any ch1-corner * 1 double_crochet + ch1 + 1 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet x 5 times 1 fpdc skip 1 st 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet x 4 times 1 fpdc skip 1 st 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet x 5 times 1 fpdc* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 20 double_crochet 1 ch1 17 fpdc round 16 colour a start in any ch1-corner * 2 double_crochet + ch2 + 2 double_crochet skip 1 st 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet x 5 times 1 fpdc skip 1 st 1 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet x 4 times 1 fpdc skip 1 st 1 double_crochet 1 fpdc 1 double_crochet x 5 times 1 fpdc skip 1 st* x 4 times don t cut your yarn you will continue with the same colour stitch count per side 20 double_crochet 17 fpdc 1 ch2 round 17 colour a start in any ch2-corner * 3 single_crochet 1 fpsc 1 single_crochet x 18 times 1 fpsc* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 21 single_crochet 19 fpsc © 2023 krokoklint design made by lina kittel all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the
